Title: Azure Local and Atos customer zero story supporting internal services | ODSP1510
Description:
Atos had a need for some services to remain on-prem and had numerous VMWare clusters coming to end of life. Azure Local was the selected solution, and in this talk we look at why Azure Local was chosen, the benefits it delivered, and how we achieved a migration off VMWare in short timescales, saving money and delivering new capabilities to our internal IT services.
